Html:
I don't know what i am doing wrong, so i hope you can help me to implement your solution.

i got this on UpdateService.xml
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="utf-8"?>
<Config xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance" xmlns:xsd="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema">
    <LocalFile path="program.exe" url="http://MyUrl.com/1507/program.exe" lastver="1.5.0.7" size="4843520" needRestart="true"/>
</Config>
and this on Autoupdater.config
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="utf-8"?>
<Config xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance" xmlns:xsd="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema">
  <Enabled>true</Enabled>
  <ServerUrl>http://MyUrl.com/UpdateService.xml</ServerUrl>
  <UpdateFileList>
    <LocalFile path="program.exe" lastver="1.5.0.6" size="4843008" />
  </UpdateFileList>
</Config>
so it fires the auto update mechanism, and download the file making a folder with the updated file, and re-run the app but the old version.

to be more specific, before the update, i have:

in C:\path\to\my\app

program.exe
Autoupdate.dll
autoupdate.config

and then after :

1507\program.exe <-------------------- updated file
program.exe
Autoupdate.dll
autoupdate.config <-------------------- updated config


so please tell me, what i am doing wrong?

hope you can helpme.

Hey hi..


Did it work please can you help me? I didn't understand how it works?

Please you can contact me...
